Lesson 32 - WAP

Expected Work

  1. Implement your custom technology stack
  2. Continue working to convert your server side application into an API to be used with an single page application
    1. Route all resources to /api/resource, route everything else to Home. Use $this→resources.
    2. All controllers need Index, Show, Create, Update, Delete that corresponds to the route's Get Post Put and Delete
    3. All controllers composer JSON not HTML
    4. All models need CRUD and possibly “read_all” method.
    5. Change form validation library to Polycademy/Validation
    6. Input is acquired from $this→input→json
    7. All messages need to go through an output and input message mapper in the inflector helper to convert snake_case to camelCase and vice versa.
    8. Implement CSRF by using the modified MY_Security library that does a CSRF verify on all requests except GET and on the HTTP header instead of the POST payload. Also make sure that the cookie name gets passed into javascript.
